head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DE ROTHSCHILD, RAPHAEL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DE ROTHSCHILD, RAPHAEL

block.p: de ROTHSCHILD-Raphael. Congregation Orach Chaim expresses its deepest sympathy and heartfelt condolences to our devoted members & dedicated supporters, Nili and Nathaniel de Rothschild, upon the untimely passing of their beloved son Raphael. We shall remember Raphael's courtesy, dignity and charm. May the Almighty grant strength and succor to the entire family and may they be consoled among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Michael D. Shmidman, Rabbi Wolf Scheck, President
